Uses of Class
sage.scene.TriMesh

  • Packages that use TriMesh 
    Package Description
    sage.model.loader  
    sage.renderer  
    sage.renderer.jogl

    sage.scene.shape

    • Uses of TriMesh in sage.model.loader

      Methods in sage.model.loader that return TriMesh 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TriMesh OBJLoader.loadModel(java.lang.String modelFilename)
      loadModel receives a String, assumed to be the name of a file containing a 3D model in WaveFront OBJ format; it reads the OBJ file and returns a TriMesh object containing the OBJ model data.
      TriMesh IModelLoader.loadModel(java.lang.String modelFileName)
      Reads the specified file, which is presumed to contain an object model in a format understood by the loadModel() method, and returns a TriMesh object containing the data describing the mode.

    • Uses of TriMesh in sage.renderer

      Methods in sage.renderer with parameters of type TriMesh 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IRenderer.draw(TriMesh trimesh)
      The renderer's implementation of drawing a TriMesh object.

    • Uses of TriMesh in sage.renderer.jogl

      Methods in sage.renderer.jogl with parameters of type TriMesh 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void JOGLRenderer.draw(TriMesh trimesh)
      The renderer's implementation of the required IRenderer method for drawing a TriMesh object.
      void JOGLActiveRenderer.draw(TriMesh t) 

    • Uses of TriMesh in sage.scene

      Subclasses of TriMesh in sage.scene 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Model3DTriMesh
      Model3DTriMesh extends TriMesh by incorporating support for model animation data and an associated Texture.

    • Uses of TriMesh in sage.scene.shape

      Subclasses of TriMesh in sage.scene.shape 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Pyramid
      This class defines a Pyramid which is a TriMesh made up of six colored triangles: four describing the triangular pyramid faces, and two describing the bottom.
      class  Quad
      Quad defines a four sided, two dimensional shape (a quadrilateral) lying flat in the Z=0 plane by default.

    • Uses of TriMesh in sage.terrain

      Subclasses of TriMesh in sage.terrain 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TerrainBlock
      TerrainBlock defines a single section of terrain.
